name: Bit's Quest
description:
How To Play:

Move using WASD
Jump with Space Bar
Hold Space for higher jump

Enemies and Hazards in your dimension can hurt you.
Press Shift to Switch Dimensions

Arrows Signify a Change in Gravity

Reach the Gate to Win

Credits:

Brian Fagan: Programming, Mechanics, Level Design
Sofia Eichelmann: Programming, Mechanics, Technical Artist
Robert Ramos: Level Design, Audio
Larry Benson: Audio, Level Concepting
Precious Boiser: 2D Artist and Animator, UI Artist
Dan Seilheimer: 3D Modeling/Animation, Technical Artist, Programming
